name: Bubble Up (Aumni)
description:
Game made in 3h for Trijam #53 - You're a bubble trying to reach the surface. Game by Frank Brizuela - Twitter: @aumniez

Contains 5 short levels. Hope you enjoy :)

How time was split:

-Programming main gameplay / game loop: 50 minutes

-Making the levels: 90 minutes

-Art: 15 minutes

-Music: 25 minutes
